thing-type.label: EM6556 In wall single switch
thing-type.description: In wall single switch<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtEminent e-DOMOTICA in wall mini switch. Allows you to turn on and turn off your illumination and other electircal devices by using the e-Domotica e-Centre touchscreen or the EM6511 e-Domotica remote control. </p&gt <p&gtThe switch utilizes the Z-Wave protocol and can be included into a Z-Wave network.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<ul&gt<li&gtPut your Z-Wave controller into inclusion mode. </li&gt <li&gtPress the button on the switch 3 times</li&gt <li&gtThe switch is now included</li&gt </ul&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<ul&gt<li&gtPut your Z-Wave controller into exclusion mode. </li&gt <li&gtPress the button on the switch 3 times</li&gt <li&gtThe switch is now excluded</li&gt </ul&gt
